features.title: In-house cluster
features.description:
Runs on any hardware 
and in the cloud

features.title: Unlimited browsers
features.description:
Run as many browsers 
as your cluster allows

features.title: Openshift supported
features.description: Runs on top of Kubernetes or Openshift

projects.title: Selenoid
projects.description: A lightning fast Selenium protocol implementation running browsers in Docker containers

projects.title: Selenoid UI
projects.description: Cool graphical user interface for Selenoid mainly needed for debugging your Selenium tests

projects.title: CM
projects.description: A fully automated installation tool for Selenoid and Selenoid UI doing all the work for you

projects.title: Ggr
projects.description: A completely stateless and lightweight load balancer used to create big Selenium clusters

projects.title: Ggr UI
projects.description: An additional component used to show all sessions running in Selenium cluster in the same Selenoid UI

articles.title: Selenium: Back to the Moon
articles.description: In this article we provide motivation for creating Moon and demonstrate first features.

articles.title: Selenium: Exploring the Moon
articles.description: This article describes Moon architecture, why it is stateless and some  advanced stuff.
